The optimal surgical approach well elucidate obese individual . Materials Methods : This randomize controlled trial compare Pfannenstiel incision place pannus ( pannus exist ) Cohen incision place pannus ( pannus exist ) ; allocation 1:1 stratification pre-gestational diabetes presence pannus . Significant confounders assess adjusted multiple regression analysis accordingly .
